ev3command.ev3
クラス Motor

java.lang.Object
  ev3command.ev3.Motor
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
EV3Protocol
public class Motor
extends java.lang.Object
implements EV3Protocol

Motor class. Contains three instances of Motor. Usage: Motor.A.forward(5000);

バージョン:
0.2 4-September-2006, 1.0 17-Aug-2013
作成者:
Brian Bagnall, Tatsuya Iwanari

          Motor A.

          Motor B.

          Motor C.
static Motor D
          Motor D.

メソッドの概要
 boolean backward()
          Causes motor to rotate backward.
 boolean forward()
          Causes motor to rotate forward.
 char getId()
          Get the ID of the motor.
 int getSpeed()
          Gets the current motor speed.
 void setSpeed(int speed)
          Sets motor speed.
 boolean stop()
          Stops the motor using brakes.
 
クラス java.lang.Object から継承されたメソッド
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

フィールドの詳細

A

public static final Motor A
Motor A.

public static final Motor B
Motor B.

public static final Motor C
Motor C.

D

public static final Motor D
Motor D.

メソッドの詳細

getId

public final char getId()
Get the ID of the motor. One of 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'.

forward

public boolean forward()
Causes motor to rotate forward.

戻り値:
Error value. true means success. false means fail.

backward

public boolean backward()
Causes motor to rotate backward.

戻り値:
Error value. true means success. false means fail.

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(int speed)
Sets motor speed. NOTE: this method doesn't send commands to EV3. To update the speed, use forward or backward method following this.

パラメータ:
speed - (0 ~ 100 %)

getSpeed

public int getSpeed()
Gets the current motor speed.

戻り値:
speed (0 ~ 100 %)

stop

public boolean stop()
Stops the motor using brakes.

戻り値:
Error value. true means success. false means fail.
